title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8188 - Minimum Qualification Standards, Training And Certification Of Local Assessment Administration Personnel
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8188 - Minimum Qualification Standards, Training And Certification Of Local Assessment Administration Personnel

State Regulations

Subpart 8188-1 - General Provisions (§ 8188-1.1)

Subpart 8188-2 - Assessors (outside Of New York City) (§ 8188-2.1 to 8188-2.9)

Subpart 8188-3 - Candidates For Assessor (§ 8188-3.1 to 8188-3.5)

Subpart 8188-4 - County Directors (§ 8188-4.1 to 8188-4.9)

Subpart 8188-5 - Real Property Appraisers (§ 8188-5.1 to 8188-5.9)

Subpart 8188-6 - Boards Of Assessment Review (§ 8188-6.1)

Subpart 8188-8 - New York City Assessors (§ 8188-8.1 to 8188-8.6)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. XVI, pt. 8188

Statutory authority: Real Property Tax Law, §§ 202[1][k], [l], 308, 310, 312, 314, 318, 320, 504, 523, 1200, 1530, 1532, 1550, art. 3, title 3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
